snippet: The Solomon R. Guggenheim Foundation and Helsinki city officials are set to open an international design competition on Wednesday for a proposed new 130-million-euro museum along the South Harbor of the Finnish capital.
abstract: The Solomon R. Guggenheim Foundation and Helsinki city officials are set to open an international design competition on Wednesday for a proposed new 130-million-euro museum along the South Harbor of the Finnish capital.

headline.main: Jury Announced for Guggenheim Helsinki Museum Design Competition
